answers.answer: Since it lasts only a short time it likely is just your color vision kicking into gear after a nights rest. The process might be longer because of your diabetes. Discuss with your Eye MD ophthalmologistJCH MD

question: Hello every one. Need help to figure out why when i wake up my vision is this reddish magenta color for about 4 to 10 seconds then returns back normally and usually i can see everything thats in the dark while this is happening. Also im a type 1 diabetic, any connections?Thank you
title: red colored eye vison
